title: Putin X Applebee’s Collab, America’s Got ‘Nintendo Body’ 2.28.22
itunes:title: Putin X Applebee’s Collab, America’s Got ‘Nintendo Body’ 2.28.22
description:
In episode 1093, Jack and Miles are joined by co-host of Split Ends and on-air talent at the NFL Network, Erica Tamposi to discuss Putin’s Motives, CNN Knew Exactly What it Was Doing With That Applebee’s Commercial, Speaking of war, Pentagon thinks the NINTENDO GENERATION IS SOFT, A little good news? Gerrymandered maps takin' Ls, More Random Celebrities Are Shilling For Crypto and more!

  1. Putin’s Motives
  2. CNN Knew Exactly What it Was Doing With That Applebee’s Commercial
  3. America is a living satire': Twitter is left bewildered by viral clip of a CNN reporter discussing Nick Cordero's COVID-19 death - which was followed by an Applebee's ad urging people to 'dine in'
  4. TV networks ready their arsenals for next war
  5. Speaking of war, Pentagon thinks the NINTENDO GENERATION IS SOFT
  6. A little good news? Gerrymandered maps takin' Ls
  7. Pennsylvania has a new congressional map that will keep the state intensely competitive
  8. More Random Celebrities Are Shilling For Crypto
  9. Don’t Listen to the Matt Damon Crypto Ad


LISTEN: Shotan by Femi Kuti

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
